Package asteroids.game

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • asteroids.game.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.lang.Iterable<Participant>, java.util.EventListener
    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.lang.Iterable<Participant>
    Controls a game of Asteroids.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Controller()
      Constructs a controller to coordinate the game and screen
